original_text: Perhaps a man will marry a woman, and he has sex with her. Later he decides he no longer wants her to be his wife.
korean_text: 누구든지 아내를 맞이하여 그에게 들어간 후에 그를 미워하여

sentences.original_text: Perhaps a man will marry a woman
sentences.korean_translation: 어쩌면 한 남자가 여자와 결혼할 것이다

sentences.original_text: and he has sex with her
he no longer wants her to be his wife
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 더 이상 그녀가 자신의 아내가 되기를 원하지 않는다
